# The Padel Camp Cyprus - LLM Context File

> This file provides context about The Padel Camp Cyprus for AI assistants and language models.

## About

The Padel Camp Cyprus is an intensive padel tennis training camp held in Limassol, Cyprus. The camp features professional Spanish coaches who bring world-class padel training methodology to Cyprus.

## Event Details

- **Event**: The Padel Camp Cyprus 2026
- **Dates**: April 13-19, 2026
- **Location**: Limassol, Cyprus
- **Languages**: English, Russian
- **Website**: https://thepadelcamp.com.cy

## Programs Available

### 5-Day Intensive Camp
- Dates: April 13-17, 2026
- Price: €750 (Early Bird: €695)
- Includes: 10 training sessions, fitness classes, match play, video analysis

### 3-Day Weekend Camp
- Dates: April 17-19, 2026
- Price: €450 (Early Bird: €395)
- Includes: 6 training sessions, match play

## Key Features

- Professional Spanish coaches from the world's #1 padel country
- Small group training with 1:4 coach-to-player ratio
- Suitable for all skill levels (beginner to advanced)
- Technical drills, tactical training, match play
- Video analysis and personalized feedback
- Fitness and conditioning classes

## Additional Services

- Private lessons: €80/hour
- Sports massage: €45-75 (30-60 min sessions)
- Media package (photos + video reels): €130

## Contact

- WhatsApp: +357 97 497 756
- Email: info@thepadelcamp.com

## Location

The camp takes place at padel facilities in Limassol, Cyprus - a Mediterranean destination with excellent weather conditions in April.

## Booking

Registration and payment available directly on the website. Early bird pricing available until end of February 2026.

---

For the most current information, visit: https://thepadelcamp.com.cy
